com.Leo.Game

类 Balls

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Leo.Game.Balls

  • public class Balls
extends java.lang.Object
    Mage Fireball

    The properties of the fireball: the speedX and speedY of the fireball - SpeedX=10,SpeedY=10, the length and width of the fireball - length=10,width=10, the position of the fireball, the direction of the fireball(diretion), whether the fireball is live(live), etc.

    Since the fireballs in different directions are actually pictures, it is necessary to consider the selection of different pictures with the corresponding direction, so to establish a Map key-value pair, use the direction of the String attribute to specify different pictures.

    There is a constructor in the class that is used to pass the position and direction by default. Of course, isomorphism is used here, and another constructor is used to get the state and interface of the fireball. (draw(Graphics)) and (move()) to control drawing fireballs and moving fireballs

    The next step is to consider the reaction of the fireball to each element. When the enemy's fireball hits the enemy, it will not kill the person, so just return true directly, without removing the fireball that the fireball encounters. Not to mention the explosion to show the explosion effect.

    从以下版本开始:
    2018.11.20
    版本:
    2.0
    作者:
    李聪

      • Balls

        public Balls(int x,
             int y,
             Direction dir)
        Mage fireball construction method with three parameters

        Where the fireball appears

        参数:
        x - Fireball upper left horizontal axis
        y - Fireball upper left ordinate
        dir - Direction of the fireball

      • Balls

        public Balls(int x,
             int y,
             boolean good,
             Direction dir,
             BattleField battleField)
        Mage fireball construction method with five parameters

        The position and definition of the fireball is the enemy fireball or our fireball.

        参数:
        x - Fireball upper left horizontal axis
        y - Fireball upper left ordinate
        dir - Direction of the fireball
        good - Whether the source of the fireball is our (true) or enemy (false)
        battleField - battlefield

    • 方法详细资料

      • move

        private void move()
        Method of portraying the fireball of the wizard

        According to the enumeration direction to determine the change of the horizontal and vertical coordinate values of the fireball, it is necessary to determine whether the fireball coordinate value is out of the battlefield interface, and if so, the fireball live=false.

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Method of drawing a fireball

        According to the direction of the fireball, the image[] pattern of the fireball is determined, and finally the fireball is moved move().

        参数:
        g - Brush tool

        Determine if the wizard's fireball is alive

      • hitHero

        public boolean hitHero(Hero hero)
        The way fireball hits a hero

        参数:

        返回:

      • hitWall

        public boolean hitWall(MetalWall w)
        Method of hitting a fireball into a metal wall

        After the fireball hits the metal wall, it only changes the survival state of the fireball.this.live = false

        参数:
        w - Metal wall
        返回:
        Boolean Hit the metal wall
